about_the_game:
This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Gyaru.”
Now you’ll be able to play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Gyaru as well.

～What Kind of Girl is Gyaru?～
Having fun is her motto, and she strives to treasure every moment: that's Gyaru. She's the type to act first and think later because if things don't go her way, she can try something else then. Like a typhoon, she constantly gets other people wrapped up in her antics. She's a free spirit who knows what she likes and what she doesn't, and she can't bring herself to do anything she doesn't want to. While she's not the smartest girl around, she's an admirable person who loves seeing others smile and brightens every room she's in.

・1 new Normal & High-poly body maid outfit!
・1 new Normal & High-poly body lingerie set!
・1 new Normal & High-poly body hairstyle!
・Over 70 playable yotogi skills!
・2 types of New Yotogi events!
・4 different branches to explore between the 2 New yotogi events!
・Hiring interview events, affection increase events, stat increase events, and plenty more opportunities for Master to talk to Gyaru!
・Conversation events with Muku, Majime, and Rindere are also included!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

Now you’ll be able to play the yotogi and H-events you enjoyed with Muku, Majime, and Rindere with Gyaru as well.
